revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: An essay towards a practical English grammar. Describing the genius and nature of the English tongue: giving likewise a rational and plain account of grammar in ge..."
revision.text: Possibly: An essay towards a practical English grammar. Describing the genius and nature of the English tongue: giving likewise a rational and plain account of grammar in general, with a familiar explanation of its terms. By James Greenwood. (London : Printed for R. Tooket...1711). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2488750~S1
